heading: Withdrawal of licensee
text:
If a licensed master fire suppression piping contractor withdraws from a master fire
   suppression piping contractor business operating pursuant to such individual’s license, the right of the business to perform fire
   suppression piping work shall lapse if the provisions of this article are no longer satisfied. If a licensed master fire suppression
   piping contractor’s license is revoked or suspended, such licensee will be deemed withdrawn from such business.
